remarks: The zero vector of partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dva0g.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dva0g.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dva0g.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dva0g.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dva0g.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dva0g $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> .0. = ( _I |` B ) ) $.
